articles.title: The Evangelical Roadshow That's Trying to Make America a Theocracy - POLITICO
articles.description: A new book on the Christian right reveals how a series of unscrupulous leaders turned politics into a powerful and lucrative gospel.
articles.content: As Barton began his presentation, I slipped away to a parlor room at the back of the sanctuary. Connelly wanted me to meet three local pastors who stood for truth. Seated around a large, rectangular … [+8541 chars]

articles.title: Who Is Nikhil Gupta, Man Charged In Failed Plot To Kill Khalistan Terrorist - NDTV
articles.description: Nikhil Gupta, an Indian national, has been charged by US federal prosecutors with conspiring with an Indian government official to assassinate Gurpatwant Singh Pannun, a Khalistani terrorist who holds American and Canadian citizenship, on US soil.
articles.content:
The US has welcomed India's efforts to probe the matter.
